----

Fury, as usual, doesn't even make sure he has =

before blaring his message to the Rogue Star common r=
oom.  "Guys!  We 
got ourselves something to do!  Devilcat wants me, Noir, =

"Well, what are we watin=
g for?" Noir asks.  The four bots race for 
the exit and, hardly taking the=

brothers' crash.

"Nice wipeout," J=
ayde comments, surveying the damage.

----

Meanwhile, Devilcat himself re-=
enters the office just in time to hear

e do," he says.  "My own troops 
are camped close enough that they'll get t=
here first - and four of 
them are already en route.  Nevertheless, they ma=
y need backup if any 
unwelcome company shows up."
